code_129.txt: ckb = ui.addCheckboxGroup(parent, list, options, width, height)

content: The parent layout where to add the CheckboxGroup.

A comma separated options.
Theme Color: `Default`, `Primary`, `Secondary`
Sizes: `Small`, `Medium`
Icon Position: `Left`, `Right`
Container: `Elevated`, `Outlined`
Corners : `Square`

text_136.txt: This will return a CheckboxGroup Component

content: Returns the absolute height of the control in pixels.
Returns the absolute distance of the control from the left in pixels.
Returns the absolute distance of the control from the top in pixels.
Returns the absolute width of the control in pixels.
A hexadecimal color of the form `#rrggbb`
The path to your image file.
Sets or returns the border thickness in pixels.
Sets or returns the border color. Color is in hexadecimal form `#rrggbb`
Sets or returns the border style. Values can be `dotted`, `dashed`, `solid`, `double`, `groove`, `ridge`, `inset` and `outset`. Default is `solid`.
Sets or returns the material icon font for check stated.
Sets or returns the theme color use for the checkbox. Values can be `Default` `Primary` or `Secondary`.
Sets or returns the corner radius in pixels.
Sets or returns the `disabled` state of the control.
Returns the html container element for the control.
Sets the style of the html container element.
Sets or returns the depth of the container.
Sets or returns the `relative` path to the font-family use.
Sets or returns the height of the control as a fraction of the parent control.
Sets or returns the color of the checkbox icon.
Sets or returns the size of the checkbox icon.
Returns whether the control is visible or not.
Sets or returns the padding of each list item. See also `setItemPadding` method.
Sets or returns the label text.
Returns the distance of the control from the left.
Sets or returns the list items.
Sets or returns the margin of the control. Works on controls with `Linear` parent only. You can also pass a number to set equal margins for all sides.
Sets or returns the opacity of the control.
Sets or returns the `options` of the control.
Sets or returns whether the container is outlined or elevated.
Sets or returns the padding of the control. You can also pass a number to set equal padding for all sides.
Returns the position of the control. The returned object has `left` `top` `right` and `bottom` props.
Sets or returns the angle of rotation in degrees.
Sets or returns the size variant of the Checkbox. Values can be `small` or `medium`.
Sets or returns the space between the checkbox icon and the text.
Sets or returns the text color in hexadecimal format.
Sets or returns the size of the checkbox icon. This will also affect the checkbox icon.
Returns the distance of the control from the top.
Returns the type of the control.
Sets or returns the material icon font for uncheck state.
Sets or returns the visibility of the control.
Sets or returns the width of the control as a fraction of the parent control.

The callback function to be called. This will pass `values Array` An array of indexes corresponding to the checked checkbox items.

Left padding of the checkbox item.

Unit of measurement. Can be `rem`, `px`, `%`, or `v` for viewport.

The type of animation. Here are the available values
`bounce`, `flash`, `pulse`, `rubberBand`, `shakeX`, `shakeY`, `headShake`, `swing`, `tada`, `wobble`, `jello`, `heartBeat`,
Back Entrances: `backInDown`, `backInLeft`, `backInRight`, `backInUp`
Back Exits: `backOutDown`, `backOutLeft`, `backOutRight`, `backOutUp`
Bouncing Entrances: `bounceIn`, `bounceInDown`, `bounceInLeft`, `bounceInRight`, `bounceInUp`
Bouncing exits: `bounceOut`, `bounceOutDown`, `bounceOutLeft`, `bounceOutRight`, `bounceOutUp`
Fading entrances: `fadeIn`, `fadeInDown`, `fadeInDownBig`, `fadeInLeft`, `fadeInLeftBig`, `fadeInRight`, `fadeInRightBig`, `fadeInUp`, `fadeInUpBig`, `fadeInTopLeft`, `fadeInTopRight`, `fadeInBottomLeft`, `fadeInBottomRight`
Fading exits: `fadeOut`, `fadeOutDown`, `fadeOutDownBig`, `fadeOutLeft`, `fadeOutLeftBig`, `fadeOutRight`, `fadeOutRightBig`, `fadeOutUp`, `fadeOutUpBig`, `fadeOutTopLeft`, `fadeOutTopRight`, `fadeOutBottomRight`, `fadeOutBottomLeft`
Flippers: `flip`, `flipInX`, `flipInY`, `flipOutX`, `flipOutY`
Lightspeed: `lightSpeedInRight`, `lightSpeedInLeft`, `lightSpeedOutRight`, `lightSpeedOutLeft`
Rotating Entrances: `rotateIn`, `rotateInDownLeft`, `rotateInDownRight`, `rotateInUpLeft`, `rotateInUpRight`
Rotating Exits: `rotateOut`, `rotateOutDownLeft`, `rotateOutDownRight`, `rotateOutUpLeft`, `rotateOutUpRight`
Specials: `hinge`, `jackInTheBox`, `rollIn`, `rollOut`
Zooming Entrances: `zoomIn`, `zoomInDown`, `zoomInLeft`, `zoomInRight`, `zoomInUp`
Zooming Exits: `zoomOut`, `zoomOutDown`, `zoomOutLeft`, `zoomOutRight`, `zoomOutUp`
Sliding Entrances: `slideInDown`, `slideInLeft`, `slideInRight`, `slideInUp`
Sliding Exits: `slideOutDown`, `slideOutLeft`, `slideOutRight`, `slideOutUp`
The x-scale of the component.Values less than `0` is smaller than the normal. While values greater than `1` is greater than the normal.
The y-scale of the component. Values less than `1` is smaller than the normal. While vaues greater than `1` is greater than the normal.
The mode of the measurements. Values can be `px` or `%`
